entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
